flawed_nl_solution:
One-quarter of 24 action figures is 24*1/4 = <<24*1/4=96/1>>96/1
She sold off 96/1 action figures so she has 24-96/1 = <<24-96/1=-72>>-72 left
One-third of -72 is -72*1/3 = <<-72*1/3=-24>>-24
She gave out -24 so she has -72--24 = <<-72--24=-48>>-48 left
#### -48

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 6, not 96/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
